com.example.chaosruler.msa_manager.services

Class encryption

  • com.example.chaosruler.msa_manager.services.encryption

  • public class encryption

    a Singleton object (only one instance in runtime) responsible for encryptiing and decrypting data stored in local database and local android machine AES 256bit was chosen for encryption protocol

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static encryption INSTANCE
      a Singleton object (only one instance in runtime) responsible for encryptiing and decrypting data stored in local database and local android machine AES 256bit was chosen for encryption protocol

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] a)
      This function decrypts a byteArray Must call generate_key() before this function
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] a)
      This function encrypts a byteArray and returns an encrypted form of that byteArray Must call generate_key() before this function
      void generate_key(android.content.Context context)
      this function is responsible for generatoin an AES key from the keystore per encryption/decryption, and refreshing the current one

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static encryption INSTANCE

        a Singleton object (only one instance in runtime) responsible for encryptiing and decrypting data stored in local database and local android machine AES 256bit was chosen for encryption protocol

    • Method Detail

      • generate_key

        public void generate_key(android.content.Context context)

        this function is responsible for generatoin an AES key from the keystore per encryption/decryption, and refreshing the current one

        Parameters:
        context - a base Context, must not be null, for keyStore access

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] a)

        This function encrypts a byteArray and returns an encrypted form of that byteArray Must call generate_key() before this function

        Parameters:
        a - byteArray to encrypt
        Returns:
        the encrypted form of that bytearray

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] a)

        This function decrypts a byteArray Must call generate_key() before this function

        Parameters:
        a - encrypted byteArray
        Returns:
        a decrypted form of that bytearray
